Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a host of features that we believe will greatly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product for $150. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that is valued at over $120, but now at a discounted rate. Don't miss out on this chance to upgrade your experience. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
